name: google-maps-earth
description: Global climate visualization application using Google Maps and Earth Engine

scripts.start:clean: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && sleep 1 && node server.js
scripts.kill-port: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process found on port 3000'
